page.title: 07PLAYING FIELD
page.content: This is on WALPOLE CHASE and was seeded during 1983.For the first year little use was made of it,but at the moment it has a CRICKET PITCH and two FOOTBALL PITCHES in winter.Three local football teams use the pitches, WALPOLE UNITED,WALPOLE CHASE and the Sunday team PRINCESS VICTORIA.There is a five a side pitch at one end of the field.The CRICKET TEAM lost all their games in their first year(1984)but in the local league and friendlies this summer have a 50% success rate.The field has mobile changing rooms, toilets and a groundsmans shed.
